name: Crafted_Impervious_Skin_D
display_help: Enhances the damage resistance of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%and recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%.
power_short_helps: Enhances Resistance, Reduces Endurance Cost and Increases Attack Rate
